pages.text: Ctenospondylus is a sphenacodontid from the Permian period. It had a much shorter sail than Dimetrodon but it would have competed with Dimetrodon for food in its environment. Ctenospondylus could grow up to 3 meters long.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw Meat$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Nested Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Find Egg in Nest
